The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 December is 1,602,174 (2,846.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 December, there were 97,524 new confirmed cases (173.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 December, there were 84,495 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 15% (13,029 extra cases).
